ChunkText: applying to umbc if you are ready to apply to umbc, your application process will vary by the kind of program you are applying for. undergraduate students freshmen and transfer students will work with the umbc office of undergraduate admission to complete an application and submit required documents.
ContextAfter: you can also research different majors, programs, resources, scholarships and opportunities with this office. undergraduate students apply to umbc in general, and once admitted, can choose a major. some majors have entrance requirements. please note that questions about the application process should be directed to the admissions office directly, as isss is not involved in this process.
